943920.name: Spinball
943920.description:
Spinball is a fast, fun, and competitive multiplayer sport game with non-stop scoring action. Rack up the points as you spin your paddles to smack the ball towards the goal, and try not to accidentally score against your own team! Spinball is continuous, meaning the ball doesn't stop after a goal - and neither does the fun!

Gameplay Options
  • Local multiplayer up to 4 players
  • Nine different arenas
  • Single player challenge mode
  • Full Controller Support
  • Keyboard Support

Customization
  • Create and customize user profiles with including colors, icons
  • Set match parameters - single games or series in your favorite arenas
  • Add more paddles for more control or fewer paddles for more speed

Track your stats
  • Post game and post match stats highlight standout performances
  • Rack up goals, saves, hits, spins and more!
  • All-time records are saved on the Stats Leaderboard
